content.query:
DROP TABLE Casualties
CREATE TABLE dbo.Casualties
	( 
[Acc_Index] VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
[Vehicle_Reference] INT,
[Casualty_Reference] INT,
[Casualty_Class] INT,
[Sex_of_Casualty] INT,
[Age_Band_of_Casualty] INT,
[Casualty_Severity] INT,
[Pedestrian_Location] INT,
[Pedestrian_Movement] INT,
[Car_Passenger] INT,
[Bus_or_Coach_Passenger] INT,
[Pedestrian_Road_Maintenance_Worker] INT,
[Casualty_Type] INT,
[Casualty_Home_Area_Type] INT
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH([Acc_Index]),
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)


--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹                 
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_Accidents
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO dbo.[Casualties] 
FROM 'https://iiiplaytestgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/powerbi/Synapse_RTC/NonSensitive/*/*/*/dftRoadSafety_Casualties.csv'

 WITH (
     FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
     ,CREDENTIAL=(
		 IDENTITY= '256a939e-4a00-4604-b90a-48e035aeafea@https://login.microsoftonline.com/2fbd54d0-77a8-4d23-ae51-dbff9104d65c/oauth2/token' , 
	 		SECRET= 'W7qISt.08b0W3B7IIPuVy_1cF.ByjlHLT.')
			 ,FIRSTROW = 2
			 
      )

--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM Casualties
GO
